medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports that the pain started last night around 9 PM, shortly after having a cheeseburger and 2 cups of coffee. She was up all night with nausea and vomited 5 times, nonbloody and nonbilious. Most recent emesis was this morning. Today, abdominal pain is more localized to the RUQ and she has only been able to tolerate Pepsi, no food. Last bowel movement was yesterday.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of hypertension (HTN), congestive heart failure (CHF) with EF 50-55%, recurrent metastatic breast cancer with recent completion of chemotherapy, history of right breast cancer status post mastectomy, allergic reaction treated with prednisone, arthritis worse in knees.
medical_history.family_history: Both parents with HTN. Father died of prostate cancer. Mother living. No family history of early myocardial infarction, arrhythmia, cardiomyopathies, or sudden cardiac death.
